content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Coal Mining Operation at position(x=43.0, y=-82.0)

Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill (position x=43.0, y=-82.0) 
- Furnace (position x=41.0, y=-82.0)
- Burner Inserter (position x=43.5, y=-80.5)
- Chest (position x=42.5, y=-83.5)
- Chest (position x=44.5, y=-81.5)
- Chest (position x=43.5, y=-79.5)
- Chest (position x=45.5, y=-80.5)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when extracting from a chest that is full
- Ensure the chest is not full before attempting to extract items from it. 
- Regularly empty the chest at position (42.5, -83.5) to continue mining.

### Errors when a drill is out of fuel
- Ensure the drill has enough fuel to operate. 
- Regularly insert coal into the drill at position (43.0, -82.0) to prevent it from running out of fuel.

### Errors when an inserter is waiting for source items
- Ensure the inserter has source items to pick up. 
- Regularly check the inventory of the chest at position (44.5, -81.5) to ensure it has items for the inserter to pick up.

### Errors when a furnace has no ingredients to smelt
- Ensure the furnace has ingredients to smelt. 
- Regularly check the inventory of the furnace at position (41.0, -82.0) to ensure it has ingredients to smelt.
